long_description: Cross-country skiing in very cold conditions? The men's Sugoi Firewall 180 Pants deliver powerful wind protection and thermal comfort so you can stay on the trail longer. Firewall 180 polyester fabric has a polyurethane coating that blocks wind and resists rain and snow. Thermal ZeroPlus brushed backing feels soft and warm. 10 in. locking zippers; highly reflective welded and zippered hand pockets. Sugoi Firewall 180 Pants offer great breathability and stretch. Closeout.
